        public boolean accepting

    • Constructor Detail

      • ServerComm

        public ServerComm(CommChannel channel,
          ServerCommReceiver commReceiver,
          java.lang.String[] events1,
          java.lang.String[] events2)
        Create an instance of a ServerComm, which allows a device to constantly listen for multiple connections, via the AdvancedComm class. This ServerComm instance will store the new connections as instances of AdvancedComm, where a single send() sends the data to all client devices.
        Parameters:
        channel - the typical CommChannel to connect with
        commReceiver - the base receiver that will be cloned to each new AdvancedComm instance
        events1 - the first set of events received
        events2 - the second set of events received

    • Method Detail

      • acceptConnections

        public void acceptConnections()
        Starts the connection listener thread that will constantly accept incoming connections from other devices.

      • send

        public boolean send(java.lang.String event1,
           java.lang.String event2,
           lejos.robotics.Transmittable data)
        The send method sends the same data and events to every device that is connected to it.
        Parameters:
        event1 - the first event
        event2 - the second event
        data - the information to be transmitted
        Returns:
        whether every send() was successful

      • stopAcceptingConnections

        public void stopAcceptingConnections()
        Stops the accepter thread from running.
